verses.verse: And when the people <WH5971> complained, <WH596> it displeased <WH7451> <WH241> the LORD: <WH3068> and the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> it; and his anger <WH639> was kindled; <WH2734> and the fire <WH784> of the LORD <WH3068> burnt <WH1197> among them, and consumed <WH398> them that were in the uttermost parts <WH7097> of the camp. <WH4264>
And the people <WH5971> cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> Moses; <WH4872> and when Moses <WH4872> prayed <WH6419> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> the fire <WH784> was quenched. <WH8257>
And he called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> Taberah: <WH8404> because <WH3588> the fire <WH784> of the LORD <WH3068> burnt <WH1197> among them.

And the mixed multitude <WH628> that <WH834> was among <WH7130> them fell a lusting: <WH183> <WH8378> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> also <WH1571> wept <WH1058> again, <WH7725> and said, <WH559> Who <WH4310> shall give us flesh <WH1320> to eat? <WH398>

We remember <WH2142> <WH853> the fish, <WH1710> which <WH834> we did eat <WH398> in Egypt <WH4714> freely; <WH2600> <WH853> the cucumbers, <WH7180> and the melons, <WH20> and the leeks, <WH2682> and the onions, <WH1211> and the garlic: <WH7762>
But now <WH6258> our soul <WH5315> is dried away: <WH3002> there is nothing <WH369> at all, <WH3605> beside <WH1115> <WH413> this manna, <WH4478> before our eyes. <WH5869>
And the manna <WH4478> was as coriander <WH1407> seed, <WH2233> and the color <WH5869> thereof as the color <WH5869> of bedellium. <WH916>

And the people <WH5971> went about, <WH7751> and gathered <WH3950> it, and ground <WH2912> it in mills, <WH7347> or <WH176> beat <WH1743> it in a mortar, <WH4085> and baked <WH1310> it in pans, <WH6517> and made <WH6213> cakes <WH5692> of it: and the taste <WH2940> of it was <WH1961> as the taste <WH2940> of fresh <WH3955> oil. <WH8081>
And when the dew <WH2919> fell <WH3381> upon <WH5921> the camp <WH4264> in the night, <WH3915> the manna <WH4478> fell <WH3381> upon <WH5921> it.

Then Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the people <WH5971> weep <WH1058> throughout their families, <WH4940> every man <WH376> in the door <WH6607> of his tent: <WH168> and the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> greatly; <WH3966> Moses <WH4872> also was displeased. <WH5869> <WH7451>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> Wherefore <WH4100> hast thou afflicted <WH7489> thy servant? <WH5650> and wherefore <WH4100> have I not <WH3808> found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in thy sight, <WH5869> that thou layest <WH7760> <WH853> the burden <WH4853> of all <WH3605> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> upon <WH5921> me?

Have I <WH595> conceived <WH2030> <WH853> all <WH3605> this <WH2088> people? <WH5971> have I <WH595> begotten <WH3205> them, that <WH3588> thou shouldest say <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Carry <WH5375> them in thy bosom, <WH2436> as <WH834> a nursing father <WH539> beareth <WH5375> <WH853> the sucking child, <WH3243> unto <WH5921> the land <WH127> which <WH834> thou sworest <WH7650> unto their fathers? <WH1>

Whence <WH4480> <WH370> should I have flesh <WH1320> to give <WH5414> unto all <WH3605> this <WH2088> people? <WH5971> for <WH3588> they weep <WH1058> unto <WH5921> me, saying, <WH559> Give <WH5414> us flesh, <WH1320> that we may eat. <WH398>
I <WH595> am not able <WH3201> <WH3808> to bear <WH5375> <WH853> all <WH3605> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> alone, <WH905> because <WH3588> it is too heavy <WH3515> for <WH4480> me.

And if <WH518> thou <WH859> deal <WH6213> thus <WH3602> with me, kill <WH2026> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> out of hand, <WH2026> if <WH518> I have found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in thy sight; <WH5869> and let me not <WH408> see <WH7200> my wretchedness. <WH7451>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Gather <WH622> unto me seventy <WH7657> men <WH376> of the elders <WH4480> <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> whom <WH834> thou knowest <WH3045> to be the elders <WH2205> of the people, <WH5971> and officers <WH7860> over them; and bring <WH3947> them unto <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> that they may stand <WH3320> there <WH8033> with <WH5973> thee.

And I will come down <WH3381> and talk <WH1696> with <WH5973> thee there: <WH8033> and I will take <WH680> of <WH4480> the spirit <WH7307> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> thee, and will put <WH7760> it upon <WH5921> them; and they shall bear <WH5375> the burden <WH4853> of the people <WH5971> with <WH854> thee, that thou <WH859> bear <WH5375> it not <WH3808> thyself alone. <WH905>

And say <WH559> thou unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> Sanctify yourselves <WH6942> against tomorrow, <WH4279> and ye shall eat <WH398> flesh: <WH1320> for <WH3588> ye have wept <WH1058> in the ears <WH241> of the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Who <WH4310> shall give us flesh <WH1320> to eat? <WH398> for <WH3588> it was well <WH2895> with us in Egypt: <WH4714> therefore the LORD <WH3068> will give <WH5414> you flesh, <WH1320> and ye shall eat. <WH398>

Ye shall not <WH3808> eat <WH398> one <WH259> day, <WH3117> nor <WH3808> two days, <WH3117> nor <WH3808> five <WH2568> days, <WH3117> neither <WH3808> ten <WH6235> days, <WH3117> nor <WH3808> twenty <WH6242> days; <WH3117>

But even <WH5704> a whole <WH3117> month, <WH2320> until <WH5704> <WH834> it come out <WH3318> at your nostrils, <WH4480> <WH639> and it be <WH1961> loathsome <WH2214> unto you: because <WH3282> that <WH3588> ye have despised <WH3988> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> which <WH834> is among <WH7130> you, and have wept <WH1058> before <WH6440> him, saying, <WH559> Why <WH4100> <WH2088> came we forth <WH3318> out of Egypt? <WH4480> <WH4714>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> The people, <WH5971> among <WH7130> whom <WH834> I <WH595> am, are six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> footmen; <WH7273> and thou <WH859> hast said, <WH559> I will give <WH5414> them flesh, <WH1320> that they may eat <WH398> a whole <WH3117> month. <WH2320>

Shall the flocks <WH6629> and the herds <WH1241> be slain <WH7819> for them, to suffice <WH4672> them? or <WH518> <WH853> shall all <WH3605> the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220> be gathered together <WH622> for them, to suffice <WH4672> them?

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Is the LORD's <WH3068> hand <WH3027> waxed short? <WH7114> thou shalt see <WH7200> now <WH6258> whether my word <WH1697> shall come to pass <WH7136> unto thee or <WH518> not. <WH3808>

And Moses <WH4872> went out, <WH3318> and told <WH1696> <WH413> the people <WH5971> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of the LORD, <WH3068> and gathered <WH622> the seventy <WH7657> men <WH376> of the elders <WH4480> <WH2205> of the people, <WH5971> and set <WH5975> them round about <WH5439> the tabernacle. <WH168>

And the LORD <WH3068> came down <WH3381> in a cloud, <WH6051> and spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> him, and took <WH680> of <WH4480> the spirit <WH7307> that <WH834> was upon <WH5921> him, and gave <WH5414> it unto <WH5921> the seventy <WH7657> elders: <WH376> <WH2205> and it came to pass, <WH1961> that, when the spirit <WH7307> rested <WH5117> upon <WH5921> them, they prophesied, <WH5012> and did not <WH3808> cease. <WH3254>

But there remained <WH7604> two <WH8147> of the men <WH376> in the camp, <WH4264> the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Eldad, <WH419> and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Medad: <WH4312> and the spirit <WH7307> rested <WH5117> upon <WH5921> them; and they <WH1992> were of them that were written, <WH3789> but went not out <WH3318> <WH3808> unto the tabernacle: <WH168> and they prophesied <WH5012> in the camp. <WH4264>
And there ran <WH7323> a young man, <WH5288> and told <WH5046> Moses, <WH4872> and said, <WH559> Eldad <WH419> and Medad <WH4312> do prophesy <WH5012> in the camp. <WH4264>

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> the servant <WH8334> of Moses, <WH4872> one of his young men, <WH4480> <WH979> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> My lord <WH113> Moses, <WH4872> forbid <WH3607> them.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto him, Enviest <WH7065> thou <WH859> for my sake? would God <WH4310> <WH5414> that all <WH3605> the LORD's <WH3068> people <WH5971> were prophets, <WH5030> and that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> would put <WH5414> <WH853> his spirit <WH7307> upon <WH5921> them!
And Moses <WH4872> got <WH622> him into <WH413> the camp, <WH4264> he <WH1931> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel. <WH3478>

And there went forth <WH5265> a wind <WH7307> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> and brought <WH1468> quails <WH7958> from <WH4480> the sea, <WH3220> and let them fall <WH5203> by <WH5921> the camp, <WH4264> as it were a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> on this side, <WH3541> and as it were a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> on the other side, <WH3541> round about <WH5439> the camp, <WH4264> and as it were two cubits <WH520> high upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH776>

And the people <WH5971> stood up <WH6965> all <WH3605> that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> and all <WH3605> that night, <WH3915> and all <WH3605> the next <WH4283> day, <WH3117> and they gathered <WH622> <WH853> the quails: <WH7958> he that gathered least <WH4591> gathered <WH622> ten <WH6235> homers: <WH2563> and they spread them all abroad <WH7849> <WH7849> for themselves round about <WH5439> the camp. <WH4264>

And while the flesh <WH1320> was yet <WH5750> between <WH996> their teeth, <WH8127> ere <WH2962> it was chewed, <WH3772> the wrath <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against the people, <WH5971> and the LORD <WH3068> smote <WH5221> the people <WH5971> with a very <WH3966> great <WH7227> plague. <WH4347>

And he called <WH7121> <WH853> the name <WH8034> of that <WH1931> place <WH4725> Kibroth-hattaavah: <WH6914> because <WH3588> there <WH8033> they buried <WH6912> <WH853> the people <WH5971> that lusted. <WH183>
And the people <WH5971> journeyed <WH5265> from Kibroth-hattaavah <WH4480> <WH6914> unto Hazeroth; <WH2698> and abode <WH1961> at Hazeroth. <WH2698>
